img_text: David Lammy @DavidLammy At 11.11am today, we mark exactly 100 years since the 11th minute of the 11th hour of the 11th day of the 11th month of 1918 when the sounds of war fell silent. We must never forget our soldiers' immense sacrifice or the brutal realities of war. #RemembranceDay2018 #Armistice! 00
